run_script.c

00001 /*******************************************************************************
00002  * This is a replacement for process_main.c which uses a predefined
00003  * set of commands specified in an "SPS" file.
00004  * The script is read in "process_script.c" and run here.
00005  *
00006  * MIT LICENSE:

00012  * to deal in the Software without restriction, including without limitation
00013  * the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense,
00014  * and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software
00015  * is furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:
00016  *
00017  * The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all
00018  * copies or substantial portions of the Software.
00019  *
00020  * THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED,
00021  * INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A
00022  * PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT
00023  * HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION
00024  * OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE
00025  * SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE.

00032 
00033 #include <stdlib.h>
00034 
00035 #include "spiceweasel.h"
00036 #include "script.h"
00037 
00038 TFrame *tmp_frame; /* Array of intermediate frames */
00039 TFrame **frame_list; /* A list of frames for concatenation */
00040 
00041 /* Initialize variables needed to run script */
00042 void process_init()
00043 {
00044   int i;
00045   int maxc;
00046 
00047   if(command.ntemp > 0) {
00048     /* Need intermediate frames */
00049     tmp_frame = (TFrame*) malloc(sizeof(TFrame)*command.ntemp);
00050     for(i=0;i<command.ntemp;i++) {
00051       tmp_frame[i].allocated = 0;
00052     }
00053   }
00054 
00055   /* Concatenate: Needs a separate array of vectors. Find largest concatenation */
00056   maxc = 0;
00057   for(i=0;i<command.nsteps;i++) {
00058     if(command.step[i].method == PROC_CONCATENATE) {
00059       if(command.step[i].nargs > maxc)
00060         maxc = command.step[i].nargs;
00061     }
00062   }
00063   if(maxc > 0) {
00064     frame_list = (TFrame**) malloc(sizeof(TFrame*) * maxc);
00065   }
00066 }
00067 
00068 TFrame *get_frame(int id, TFrame *input, TFrame *output)
00069 {
00070   if(id == UNKNOWN_FRAME) {
00071     printf("Error in compiled script: Unknown frame\n");
00072     exit(1);
00073   }else if(id == OUTPUT_FRAME) {
00074     return(output);
00075   }else if(id == INPUT_FRAME) {
00076     return(input);
00077   }
00078   return(&(tmp_frame[id]));
00079 }
00080 
00081 #define GETFRAME(id) get_frame(id, framebuffer[centreframe], output)
00082 
00083 /******************* RUN SCRIPT *****************/
00084 
00085 int process_frames(TFrame **framebuffer, int nframes, int centreframe, TFrame *output)
00086 {
00087   int i, j;
00088   TProcess *proc;
00089   TFrame *in, *out, *f;
00090 
00091   if(command.minimum_frame != UNKNOWN_FRAME) {
00092     /* Calculate the minimum background */
00093     minimum_frames(framebuffer, nframes, &(tmp_frame[command.minimum_frame]), -1);
00094   }
00095   if(command.average_frame != UNKNOWN_FRAME) {
00096     /* Calculate average background */
00097     average_frames(framebuffer, nframes, &(tmp_frame[command.average_frame]), -1);
00098   }
00099   /* Go through commands */
00100   for(i=0;i<command.nsteps;i++) {
00101     proc = &(command.step[i]);
00102 
00103     /* Get pointers to the input and outputs */
00104     if(proc->method != PROC_CONCATENATE) { /* concatenate has no input */
00105       in = GETFRAME(proc->input);
00106     }
00107     out = GETFRAME(proc->result);
00108 
00109     switch(proc->method) {
00110     case PROC_SUBTRACT: {
00111       /* Get pointer to the argument */
00112       f = GETFRAME(proc->args[0].frame);
00113       subtract_background(in, f, out);
00114       break;
00115     }
00116     case PROC_NORMALIZE: {
00117       normalize_frame(in, out);
00118       break;
00119     }
00120     case PROC_AMPLIFY: {
00121       amplify_frame(in, out, proc->args[0].fval);
00122       break;
00123     }
00124     case PROC_GAMMA: {
00125       gamma_correct_frame(in, out, proc->args[0].fval);
00126       break;
00127     }
00128     case PROC_OFFSET: {
00129       offset_frame(in, out, proc->args[0].fval);
00130       break;
00131     }
00132     case PROC_DESPECKLE_MEDIAN: {
00133       despeckle_median(in, out, proc->args[0].ival);
00134       break;
00135     }
00136     case PROC_KUWAHARA: {
00137       kuwahara_filter(in, out, proc->args[0].ival);
00138       break;
00139     }
00140     case PROC_SHARPEN: {
00141       sharpen_simple(in, out, proc->args[0].fval);
00142       break;
00143     }
00144     case PROC_UNSHARP_MASK: {
00145       sharpen_unsharp(in, out, proc->args[0].fval, proc->args[1].fval);
00146       break;
00147     }
00148     case PROC_CONCATENATE: {
00149       /* Build an array of frames */
00150       for(j=0;j<proc->nargs;j++) {
00151         frame_list[j] = GETFRAME(proc->args[j].frame);
00152       }
00153       concat_frames(out, proc->nargs, frame_list);
00154       break;
00155     }
00156     case PROC_COPY: {
00157       copy_frame(in, out);
00158       break;
00159     }
00160     case PROC_GAUSSBLUR: {
00161       gauss_blur(in, out, proc->args[0].fval);
00162       break;
00163     }
00164     default: {
00165       printf("Error in compiled script: Unknown function %d\n", proc->method);
00166       exit(1);
00167     }
00168     }
00169     
00170   }
00171   /* Set number of output frame */
00172   output->number = framebuffer[centreframe]->number;
00173 
00174   /* Set time of output frame */
00175   output->time = framebuffer[centreframe]->time;
00176 
00177   return(0);
00178 }
